titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 584) to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey a fish hatchery to the State of Iowa.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-117, by Mr. McInnis.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 584 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 47.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/11/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the open rule for the consideration of H.R. 584 (directing the Secretary of the Interior to convey a fish hatchery to the State of Iowa).
